tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_ip VARCHAR(255),
  destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  protocol VARCHAR(50),
  action VARCHAR(50),
  alert_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    destination_ip VARCHAR,
    protocol VARCHAR,
    data_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE security_breaches (
    breach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    destination_ip VARCHAR,
    breach_type VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_address VARCHAR,
    destination_address VARCHAR,
    protocol VARCHAR,
    port INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE security_breaches (
    breach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    detection_time TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT,
    breach_type VARCHAR,
    status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_requirements (
    requirement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulatory_body VARCHAR,
    compliance_status VARCHAR,
    deadline DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    destination_ip VARCHAR,
    port_number INT,
    protocol VARCHAR,
    data_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE security_breaches (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT,
    severity_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_requirements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_name VARCHAR,
    compliance_status VARCHAR,
    deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE detected_threats (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_type VARCHAR,
    detection_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    details TEXT
)
